interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: wet n wild Megalast Nail Color, Under Your Spell, 0.45 Fluid Ounce Review Date: 2022/11/07 Store: wet n wild Product Description: ['All the end results of going to the nail salon, but without the hassle. The driving, the sitting, the waiting, the forced small-talk, and especially the pricey manicurist bills - forget it! Looking salon pampered just got easier! These 5-day, chip-resistant formulas are just so darn great, delivering a professional, yet far more accessible, look. Ever wonder what actually makes a "salon" formula? Read the features!'] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'wet n wild', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'top_coat', 'Material Type Free': 'Formaldehyde Free', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long Wearing', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.14 x 1.14 x 3.43 inches; 0.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '216B', 'UPC': '077802521620', 'Manufacturer': 'wet n wild'} Review Text: This polish is so sheer and streaky.
I love the brush sure but the quality of the polish itself is horrible.
I have to do three coats and the end result ain’t worth the extra time and patience it requires. Review Title: Horrible Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

See more', 'Item Volume': '1 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 2.27 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1303', 'Department': 'unisex-adult', 'UPC': '855394003034', 'Manufacturer': 'PMD Personal Microderm', 'Country of Origin': 'Vietnam', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Item can be shipped within U.S.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More'} Loving my PMD!
Bought these because I'm extra sensitive on cheeks. Great [KARADIUM] PUCCA LOVE EDITION Cheek & Shading 5.4g - 5 Colors (#03 BABY PINK) {'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 2.3 x 0.4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '887406060773'} Nice smooth texture and good payoff with finger swatch. Very nice girlish colour. No smell. Five Stars Soap for Geeks - BEST SELLER! 6 oz Soap by Whiskey River Soap Co. Whiskey River Soap Co. {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Whiskey River Soap Co.', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.9 x 2.5 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEE-S', 'UPC': '687437825361'} Smells so good Yummy Holika Holika [Sweet Peko Edition] Peko Melty Jelly Blusher Tint 03 Melting Strawberry … HOLIKA HOLIKA {'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Brand': 'HOLIKA HOLIKA', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1.9 x 1.8 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} The pot is three times the size it needs to be.
The product fills up about 1/4.
Seems like there is way too little product for the cost. Deceitful photo describing product. Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Pre-Tox Peel Off Antioxidant Face Mask with Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Vitamin E & Blackberry Complex, Non-Comedogenic, Paraben- & Phthalate-Free, 0.35 oz (Pack of 3) Aveeno {'Brand': 'Aveeno', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliator,Exfoliate', 'Scent': 'Blackberry', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalate-free,Paraben-free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 3.62 x 0.47 inches; 1.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '191567912414'} Never has a peel off mask removed a layer of skin.
Be very careful.
I’m always able to use them to this area which is the high cheek not the under eye.
Never any issues before with other products but for some reason this one it was. Very agressive peel off mask which took skin with it. ALICE 13x6 Lace Front Brown Wig, 22" Long Deep Part Silky Straight Synthetic Flaxen Brown Wig for Women, Pre Plucked with Natural Hairline and Baby Hair ALICE {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ALICE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.57 x 7.72 x 1.89 inches; 14.11 Ounces'} Mine is not brown. It has Pastel pink on and dark blonde underneath. it’s also way too big even when the straps are adjusted. I feel like I didn’t get anything close to what I ordered. Not what I ordered. Oil of Life Sensitive Skin Body Wash 3 Pack ~ 2 in 1 Sensitive Skin Moisturizing Body Wash Soap for Men, Women 15oz Made in Oil of life body wash oil of life body wash 0 Oil {'Brand': 'Oil', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Fl Oz', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.58 x 5.47 x 3.23 inches; 3.33 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'oil of life body wash', 'UPC': '637740060225'} I enjoyed this body wash.
Doesn’t smell like much which I like.
Lathers well. Enjoyed wet n wild Megalast Nail Color, Under Your Spell, 0.45 Fluid Ounce wet n wild ['All the end results of going to the nail salon, but without the hassle. The driving, the sitting, the waiting, the forced small-talk, and especially the pricey manicurist bills - forget it! Looking salon pampered just got easier! These 5-day, chip-resistant formulas are just so darn great, delivering a professional, yet far more accessible, look. Ever wonder what actually makes a "salon" formula? Read the features!'] {'Brand': 'wet n wild', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'top_coat', 'Material Type Free': 'Formaldehyde Free', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long Wearing', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.14 x 1.14 x 3.43 inches; 0.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '216B', 'UPC': '077802521620', 'Manufacturer': 'wet n wild'} This polish is so sheer and streaky.
I love the brush sure but the quality of the polish itself is horrible.
I have to do three coats and the end result ain’t worth the extra time and patience it requires. Horrible

actual_interaction.title: Horrible
actual_interaction.text:
This polish is so sheer and streaky.
I love the brush sure but the quality of the polish itself is horrible.
I have to do three coats and the end result ain’t worth the extra time and patience it requires.
actual_interaction.title_meta: wet n wild Megalast Nail Color, Under Your Spell, 0.45 Fluid Ounce
features: A revolutionary resin polymer system for exceptional color adhesion
Calcium and mineral fortified to help prevent nail discoloration
Our ManiCurve Pro Brush is absolutely incredible - The rod is flat so the liquid drains down to the bristles equally, and the rounded bristles hug your nail curves perfectly
description: All the end results of going to the nail salon, but without the hassle. The driving, the sitting, the waiting, the forced small-talk, and especially the pricey manicurist bills - forget it! Looking salon pampered just got easier! These 5-day, chip-resistant formulas are just so darn great, delivering a professional, yet far more accessible, look. Ever wonder what actually makes a "salon" formula? Read the features!
